my mother met elvis.

participant_2.background:
I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes.
I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones.
its great fun.
I feel closer to some of my family members than others.
i am six feet tall.

content.text: Hi there! What do you do for fun?
I like to build sustainable solutions for the environment.
That's really cool! What kind of things do you build?
I work on a lot of different projects, but I'm currently working on a solar-powered water heater.
That's awesome! I'm really interested in sustainability, so I'd love to hear more about your work.
Sure! I can tell you more about it later, but right now I have to get back to work.
Okay, no problem! I'll talk to you later!
Have a good day!
You too!
Hey! I'm back. I was wondering if you'd still like to hear more about my work?
Sure! I'd love to hear more.

Okay, so I'm currently working on a solar-powered water heater. It's basically a device that uses the sun's energy to heat water. This is a great way to save money on energy costs, and it's also good for the environment.
That's really cool! How does it work?
It's actually pretty simple. The water heater has a solar panel on top, which collects the sun's energy. The energy is then used to heat the water inside the heater.
That's amazing! I can't believe I've never heard of this before.
Yeah, it's pretty cool. I'm really excited to see how it works out.
I'm sure it's going to be great!
Thanks! I hope so.
Well, I have to go now, but it was really nice talking to you.
You too! I hope we can talk again soon.
Me too! Bye!
Bye!
